data.title: Get a NEXTGEN TV and get more TV
data.meta_description: The features and technology you demand from your entertainment are now built for broadcast.
data.text:
Take a closer look at all the interactive, built-in features that make your favorite over-the-air shows, news and live events even more entertaining.

Play Video

Check this website for certified products that also include security verification, for the best possible entertainment experience.

EXPERIENCE FREE BROADCAST TV

NEXTGEN TV is a free, over-the-air service available to viewers with an antenna in most major markets. All you need is a NEXTGEN TV and an HD antenna, and you can watch a wide variety of broadcast channels at no charge.

TV that automatically upgrades

When you purchase a NEXTGEN-enabled TV, its built-in technology adapts as new features become available, so your TV will keep improving over time.

Immerse yourself in entertainment

NEXTGEN TV delivers 4K HDR ultra-high-definition video and movie theater-quality audio to bring what you’re watching to life in your living room.

Go beyond simply watching

From enhanced content and personalized recommendations to an advanced TV guide, NEXTGEN TV gives you the technology to not just watch, but also engage and interact with your entertainment.

Choose from top TV tech brands

Hisense, Samsung, Sony and TCL are already offering more than 100 NEXTGEN TV models now through many retail channels! Look for the certification logo on the box and at retail!

Look for the certification logo

NEXTGEN TV is the free over-the-air service now being rolled out across the country as an upgrade to broadcast digital TV. Local stations are beginning to take full advantage of the capabilities of the ATSC 3.0 broadcast standard, including securing signals to prevent theft of content or harm to consumer receiving equipment. Products with the NEXTGEN TV certification logo are designed to properly receive and display NEXTGEN TV content, and we encourage consumers to look for the certification mark when purchasing new equipment. TV manufacturers with available certified receivers to date include Hisense, Samsung, Sony and TCL. Later in 2023, we expect the first certified upgrade accessory receivers to be available that will properly receive signals and deliver the full NEXTGEN TV audio and video experience. If you have a concern about the capabilities of your receiver, we recommend contacting the manufacturer directly.

Hisense

Samsung

Sony

TCL

Upgrade your current TV with a NEXTGEN upgrade accessory

NEXTGEN TV is now available with certified upgrade accessories that can bring the improved audio and video experience of next-generation broadcasting to any home television.

Welcome to the free world with the best antenna for your NEXTGEN TV.

Use one of our trusted and vetted vendors to select the proper antenna for your city, your terrain, and your needs.

Featured

Partner

TV that’s more than visual. It’s visionary.

The TCL QM8 is the very first NEXTGEN TV model in TCL’s lineup. TCL’s all-new QM8 showcases industry-leading innovations, on a grand scale. At the heart of these models is QD-Mini LED technology, developed in-house at TCL, which brings in unmistakable brilliance, captivating contrast and black levels, and colors you never even knew existed. Plus, the power and brains of TCL’s most advanced AI processing for clarity and detail that’s better than the theater.

Easy to use. Interactive. Personal.

Explore the features that make NEXTGEN TV a must-have.

Here’s how to get NEXTGEN TV

NEXTGEN TV is on track to be available to over 80% of U.S. households. See if it’s already in your city—or is coming soon.

View Coverage Map

Look for the NEXTGEN TV logo at retail from the many brands committed to delivering new enhanced TV features.

Shop Devices

Use your TV’s built-in antenna or connect an external one to scan for NEXTGEN TV channels.

You can receive NEXTGEN TV without an internet connection, but adding one gives you access to all the interactive features.
